author: greystroke
content: Interestingly, LUCID builds on top of EIP-7732 (ePBS) and EIP-7805 (FOCIL), extending both. It's also compatible with BALs (EIP-7928) since decrypted transactions are known before the builder constructs the block. So would need to either go in with FOCiL or after it. Can they go in together in Hegot√° if they both headliners? They both seem more like CL changes.
